game.name: Shooter Job
game.description:
It is time to become a pro shooter! Do you think that you should have enough knowledge how to piece together your gun? Join Shooter Job game and get ready to build a powerful pistol before the time runs out! Try to piece together your gun in the right order as fast as you can to score the maximum points in the end in this brand new action game! Once you are done, you will also get a chance to hit the targets with bullets available for you. 

Do not forget to reload your gun quickly so that you enjoy the activity of shooting in your own way! Keep completing this order until your time does not expire in this one of the best shooting games for kids! Have a look at your final stats to learn whether you have secured your place at the top of the leaderboards in this fun filled gun game! Try to keep your eyes on your targets and get you prepared to fire when the time comes!

You are sure to improve your combat prowess in this html5 shooter game. Build a gun, and try to collect as much points as possible by firing perfectly at your targets! You will be out of the game if your time is over. Use all 10 bullets to aim at the targets and do not forget to reload your gun in case if you run out of ammo! We hope that if you like this gun building game, you will also enjoy our other free weapon games available on atmegame.com. Good luck to browse our more gun shooting games during your free time!
